fold.subcopy: Mist.io gives you total visibility and control of your hybrid infrastructure

howitworks.p1: Add the infrastructure you want to manage - public or private. All your devices will be available from a unified interface.
howitworks.p2: Invite team members and delegate access. See real time cost and usage reporting. Create, reboot or destroy virtual machines. View their metadata, tag and search them.
howitworks.p3: Assign keys, run and schedule scripts. Enable monitoring, alerting & automation. You'll have a clear picture of all your infrastructure.

faq.question: How do I use it?
faq.answer: The easiest way to get started with Mist.io is to [sign up](http://localhost/sign-up) to the freemium SaaS version.

faq.question: Can I install it on-premises?
faq.answer: Yes! There is an Enterprise edition as well as a [Community Supported Open Source](https://github.com/mistio/mist.io) one.

faq.question: How much does it cost?
faq.answer: You can manage unlimited machines and you can enable monitoring and automation for a single machine with 1 week data retention for free.

faq.question: How secure is it?
faq.answer: Mist.io can help you enhance security by implementing policies to control and audit access consistently across your entire infrastructure. We're continously hardening our own code and processes, while we use Mist.io ourselves to manage all internal infrastructure. We run a bounty program for responsible disclosures. For more info contact infosec at mist.io
